about.title: About Us
about.historyText: Blockchain BENIN Charity is the charitable branch of the Blockchain BENIN project. Born from the desire to put technology at the service of humanitarian aid, our organization uses the blockchain to guarantee transparent, traceable, and truly impactful actions. We believe that trust is the pillar of generosity, and we are committed to strengthening it with every project.
about.visionText: Our vision is twofold: on the one hand, to provide concrete and effective aid to vulnerable populations in Benin, and on the other hand, to become a key player in the popularization of blockchain technology, by demonstrating its potential for social good. We aspire to a future where every donor can track their donation and see its direct impact, thus strengthening the link between generosity and action.
